close(uint256,uint256).details: Closes the user's position and returns the trade result after processing.

params.fillerPoolId: Thss id of the filler pool.
params.positionId: Ths id of the user position to be closed.

returns.perpTradeResult: The result of the processed trade.

confirmLiquidation(uint256).details: Confirms the liquidation for a given filler pool.

params.fillerPoolId: The id of the filler pool.

execLiquidationCall(uint256,(address,byt.details: Anyone can liquidate position but only filler can cover negative margin

params.settlementData: The route of settlement created by liquidator

executeOrder(uint256,(bytes,bytes),(addr.details: Fillers can open position and anyone can close position

params.settlementData: The route of settlement created by filler

depositToFillerPool(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits margin to the filler margin pool.

execLiquidationCall(uint256,(address,byt.notice: Executes liquidation call for the position

executeOrder(uint256,(bytes,bytes),(addr.notice: Verifies signature of the order and executes trade

withdrawFromFillerPool(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws margin from the filler margin pool.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IFillerMarket.SignedOrder memory,address) pure returns (struct PerpOrder memory,struct ResolvedOrder memory)
function (struct PerpMarket.Filler storage pointer,struct PerpMarket.UserPosition storage pointer)

function (struct PerpMarket.Filler storage pointer,uint256,int256,int256,struct ISettlement.SettlementData memory) returns (struct PerpMarket.PerpTradeResult memory,struct IPredyPool.TradeResult memory)
function (struct PerpOrder memory,struct IPredyPool.TradeResult memory) pure external
function (struct IPredyPool.TradeParams memory,struct ISettlement.SettlementData memory) external returns (struct IPredyPool.TradeResult memory)
function (struct PerpMarket.Filler storage pointer,struct PerpMarket.UserPosition storage pointer)
function (struct PerpMarket.Filler storage pointer,struct PerpMarket.UserPosition storage pointer)

function (struct PerpMarket.Filler storage pointer,uint256,int256,int256,struct ISettlement.SettlementData memory) returns (struct PerpMarket.PerpTradeResult memory,struct IPredyPool.TradeResult memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct IPredyPool.VaultStatus memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Confirms the liquidation for a given filler pool.
 @param fillerPoolId The id of the filler pool.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct PerpMarket.Filler storage pointer,uint256,int256,int256) returns (struct PerpMarket.PerpTradeResult memory)
function (struct ResolvedOrder memory) pure returns (struct ISignatureTransfer.PermitTransferFrom memory)
function (struct ResolvedOrder memory,address) pure returns (struct ISignatureTransfer.SignatureTransferDetails memory)
function (struct ISignatureTransfer.PermitTransferFrom memory,struct ISignatureTransfer.SignatureTransferDetails memory,address,bytes32,string memory,bytes memory) external
function (struct IPredyPool.TradeParams memory,struct ISettlement.SettlementData memory) external returns (struct IPredyPool.TradeResult memory)
function (struct PerpMarket.Filler storage pointer,uint256,int256,int256) returns (struct PerpMarket.PerpTradeResult memory)

documentation.text: @notice If position is safe return true, if not return false.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct Perp.PairStatus memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct IPredyPool.VaultStatus memory)
